scripts.test: concurrently 'npm run test --prefix server/' 'npm run test2 --prefix test_app/'
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm run start --prefix server/' 'npm run start --prefix test_app/'
scripts.runserver: npm run build && npm run runserver --prefix server/
scripts.deploy: npm i && npm run npm_i && npm run build && npm run runserver --prefix server/
